string.text: Hey!
Hi!
Where is the money for the job?
Find my XO and you'll have money!
Well, but this time no cheating!
Who are you?
Leh-Jaw call me! And these tramps, my team!
What you and your men doing here?
I and my guys going out there! Like the rest, we will go to Pripyat!
What do you know about Pripyat?
Know this is an old abandoned city in the era of communism! It's from the story!\nI Think now it's crawling with monsters and hordes of Monolith! Those who went there before me never came back!\n
I think it is very dangerous?
No doubt, as long as those who went there did not return.
Have you seen war around?
Not the military I have not seen for a long time they did not come across.
Can military stalkers met?

According to rumors they are somewhere on the Radar there, well, where antenna! As they passed out, a lot of people went to the Radar and continue to Pripyat! How we got here, the day as we're doing here, no one appeared. Maybe someone blocked the road here.
I think the path on the Radar blocked by the military?

I do not think that the military, long ago, I did not see them, but the military stalkers would! They are not kidding, so they are very tough guys, and act quickly and smoothly, it is strange that here is not the way they used not covered!
Why are they in Pripyat did not go or did not blocked the road on it?
I do not know, maybe afraid or preparing for something, guess what they have in mind.
Maybe you have a job?
Well, there's one thing, but it is not very easy, come from?
Yeah, I'm not frightened of this wording!
No, well its me once!
Understand, I'm afraid, prefer to spend money and send instead of themselves or their people someone!

Well, that's good!
a Job, find my scouts, Scrap and Logs! They went to Pripyat, I decided not to go as the others headlong into the jaws of a tiger, and sent his best guys!
Find them alive and bring them back here, but if they died to bring me their guns!
Perform the task will take 2000 wood!!!
Well done!
Give little money, come on 4000 wooden and hand, okay?
That's all I can offer. for this task!
OK, waiting for you here!
The task is solved!
Well come on his PDA!
Here, give me the money!
Blatant Scam, considering that he had nothing!
I'm soaked!
Caught me another! Kill!
Okay I understand, good luck!t
I'll have nothing to give, no money. If you want you can leave it stuff!
No money! Free!
I haven't found it yet!
Find it faster, if you want to get your money!
I found your guys, they died here their weapons!
Thank you, it means they died, I think it makes no sense to go to Pripyat yet! One problem remains, I can't give you money for the job. My Deputy has gone missing and with him all the money!
Well, I'll find it! Tell me where to find it? And don't ditch me this time!!!
I think he had not gone far, it may be, let me give you on the map note, here or here! As you find him bring him here, or his PDA!
Okay, wait for me!!!
I haven't found them yet.
Get them quick! I can't wait forever!!! Good luck!
